articles.description: Watch clips, follow live text updates and listen to BBC Test Match Special commentary as England host Sri Lanka in the first women's T20 at Hove.
articles.title: England v Sri Lanka, first T20 – radio, clips & text

articles.description: Watch live BBC Scotland coverage and follow text updates as Aberdeen attempt to reach the Europa League group stage against Swedish side BK Hacken.
articles.title: Watch: Europa League play-off - Aberdeen host BK Hacken (agg 2-2)

articles.description: Andy Murray's hopes of achieving a long-awaited deep run at a Grand Slam are ended by Bulgaria's Grigor Dimitrov in the US Open second round.
articles.title: Murray out of US Open in second round

articles.description: Aston Villa are well on their way to the Europa Conference League group stage as they boast a 5-0 lead over Hibernian.
articles.title: Conference League play-off: Aston Villa v Hibernian - build-up

articles.description: Katie Boulter and Andy Murray are among six Britons in singles action on day four of the US Open - follow live text and Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary.
articles.title: US Open: Boulter & Draper play before Murray - radio & text

articles.description: Newcastle United will play Paris St-Germain, Borussia Dortmund and AC Milan in the group stage of the 2023-24 Champions League.
articles.title: Newcastle face PSG on Champions League return

articles.description: Hearts' hopes of reaching the Europa Conference League group stage for the second season in a row are brutally extinguished by a rampant PAOK in a one-sided play-off second leg.
articles.title: Hearts hammered by PAOK in play-off exit

articles.description: Gareth Southgate's faith in some England players is admirable, but when does the loyalty become misplaced, asks Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Is Southgate taking loyalty too far?'

articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr promises an "exquisite" and "supernatural" win over Liam Smith as the pair exchange verbal blows before Saturday's rematch in Manchester.
articles.title: Watch: Smith & Eubank Jr spar verbally before rematch

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says his decision to sign a new contract with Mercedes was motivated by the fact he and the team have "unfinished business" in Formula 1.
articles.title: Hamilton has ‘unfinished business’ in F1
